v08.01-law.summary: Scriptura v8.1 — The Law in Motion. Deterministic and auditable rendering of canonical texts from Invocation to Covenant.

v08.00-covenant.summary: Scriptura v8.0 — The Covenant Build. Focused on memory, witness, and audit binding for continuity of Law.

v07.05-law.summary: Scriptura v7.5 — The Lawgiver Edition. Foundation of the Path and Covenant sequence, superseded by the 8.x lineage.
